mapper.sql: WHERE UPPER(artist) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchKeyword})||'%' OR UPPER(painter) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchKeyword})||'%' OR UPPER(material) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchKeyword})||'%' OR UPPER(title) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchKeyword})||'%' OR createyear LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY regdate DESC, seq DESC
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TITLE, SEQ, CREATEYEAR, ARTSIZE, IMAGEPATH, VIEWCOUNT, REGDATE, ARTIST, PAINTER, MATERIAL FROM V_ART

SELECT seq, code, name, codeName, imagePath, artcount, SUBSTR(remark, 1, 400) || CASE WHEN LENGTH(remark) <= 400 THEN '' ELSE '...' END AS remark FROM V_CATEGORY WHERE UPPER(name)=UPPER(#{searchKeyword}) AND artCount > 0
